sentences.en: Could you give me a quotation for my consignment now?
sentences.cn: 您能对我们的寄售货物做一下估价 吗 ?

sentences.en: Enclosed is our set of the shipping documents covering this consignment.
sentences.cn: 随附我们关于此货的全套海运提单.

sentences.en: I'll do that. I've got to state the consignment's safely packed, haven't I ?
sentences.cn: 我会的. 我还要说明,托运货物包装安全, 对 吧 ?

sentences.en: It's really something wrong with the quality of this consignment of bicycles.
sentences.cn: 这批自行车的质量确实有问题.

sentences.en: Maintain and update consignment stock record , monitor consignment shipments with scheduled deliveries.
sentences.cn: 维护和更新库存数据, 跟踪定期交付货物的出货状态.

sentences.en: The colour of the shipment is much darker than that of your previous consignment.
sentences.cn: 这批货的颜色比上批要暗许多.

sentences.en: The exporter can enter into consignment transaction.
The first consignment of food was flown in yesterday.
sentences.cn: 第一批食品昨天空运到了。

sentences.en: The retailer accepted the shipment on consignment.
sentences.cn: 零售商接受了运来的寄售物品

sentences.en: The salesman sorted his new consignment of stockings.
sentences.cn: 推销员把新到的一批长袜清理分类.

sentences.en: They're concerned with the dispatch and receipt of consignment.
sentences.cn: 和他们有关的是发货和接货.

sentences.en: This last consignment of hosiery is quite up to standard.
sentences.cn: 这批新到的针织品完全符合规格.

sentences.en: We assume that damage occurred while the consignment was in your care.
sentences.cn: 我们认为货物是在你方保管时受到损害的.

sentences.en: We have to ask you to dispatch the consignment immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们得要求你立即发送该批货物。

sentences.en: We must ask you to dispatch the consignment immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们必须要求你立即发送该批货物.

sentences.en: We usually only order goods on consignment.
sentences.cn: 我们通常只能订购寄售的货物.

words.tran_cn: 交付；托运；寄存；把…委托给

phrases.tran_cn: 托运单；托运收据；寄售通知书
寄售方式：规定只有在售完后才付款并且未售出的物品可以被退还给委托人

trans.tran_cn: 装运的货物，托运的货物，托运，运送，委托，托管
trans.tran_en: a quantity of goods that are sent somewhere, especially in order to be sold
